snippet: Greece's international lenders should lower the country's fiscal targets from 2021 onwards to help boost its growth potential, central bank governor Yannis Stournaras said on Saturday....

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Skewed Ledger of Achievements
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Skewed Ledger of Achievements

lead_paragraph: Greece's international lenders should lower the country's fiscal targets from 2021 onwards to help boost its growth potential, central bank governor Yannis Stournaras said on Saturday.
